product_context.title: ELEGRP 4 Way Decorative Light Switch, 15Amp, 120-277 Volt, AC Decorator Rocker Paddle Wall Switch Replacement, Self-Grounding, Residential and Commercial Grade, UL Listed (10 Pack, Glossy White)

reviews.productTitle: ELEGRP 4 Way Decorative Light Switch, 15Amp, 120-277 Volt, AC Decorator Rocker Paddle Wall Switch Replacement, Self-Grounding, Residential and Commercial Grade, UL Listed (10 Pack, Glossy White)
reviews.text: I’m a licensed electrical contractor and typically use Pass & Seymour Legrand switches. I bought this ELEGRP 10-pack because of the price and high reviews, but I won’t make that mistake again. Right out of the box, the switches felt rough, clunky, and low quality ,definitely not what I’d call contractor-grade. I needed them for a job the next day, so I reluctantly installed six. One failed immediately and wouldn’t function at all. Because of that failure and how poor these feel, I’m planning to remove all of them and replace them with reliable switches. I can’t take the risk of callbacks or failures on a job. I’ve used ELEGRP outlets before without issue, but after this experience, I’m not sure I’ll trust anything from them going forward. Not worth the risk.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2025
reviews.title: One Failed Immediately – I’m Pulling Them All Out

reviews.productTitle: ELEGRP 4 Way Decorative Light Switch, 15Amp, 120-277 Volt, AC Decorator Rocker Paddle Wall Switch Replacement, Self-Grounding, Residential and Commercial Grade, UL Listed (10 Pack, Glossy White)
reviews.text: I would say I am an intermediate skilled DIYer and I found these light switches to be a bit more difficult to handle. The wires must be bent perfectly around the screw to be secured properly so it took a little time since my house is older and the wires are more robust. I was still able to complete the project and all switches worked properly. Would buy again for sure just took some practice on bending the wires properly.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2024
reviews.title: Well made but difficult to install for a beginner.

reviews.productTitle: ELEGRP 4 Way Decorative Light Switch, 15Amp, 120-277 Volt, AC Decorator Rocker Paddle Wall Switch Replacement, Self-Grounding, Residential and Commercial Grade, UL Listed (10 Pack, Glossy White)
reviews.text: As others have commented - attaching wires to these switches is very frustrating - the screws recede into the housing when trying to use the external screws to wire to, and trying to insert the wires into the back 1) is very difficult and 2) requires you to "tighten the screw" which just seems to spin without tightening to retain the wire. The switches are cheap but if you value your time and all get a reputable brand so you don't feel the need to smash these cheap switches with a sledgehammer when you can't get the wires to stay put.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.title: Nice price but incredibly frustrating to install

reviews.productTitle: ELEGRP 4 Way Decorative Light Switch, 15Amp, 120-277 Volt, AC Decorator Rocker Paddle Wall Switch Replacement, Self-Grounding, Residential and Commercial Grade, UL Listed (10 Pack, Glossy White)
reviews.text: Over all good product for function and cost. Only complaint is the rocker takes a little effort to push on or off. There is more resistance when pushing on the rocker, it's not as light and smooth action like a Bestten. Also it took a little more than usual effort to wire the nut because it's short. The push in option also took a little effort for it to get in the hole.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.title: Good Value

reviews.productTitle: ELEGRP 4 Way Decorative Light Switch, 15Amp, 120-277 Volt, AC Decorator Rocker Paddle Wall Switch Replacement, Self-Grounding, Residential and Commercial Grade, UL Listed (10 Pack, Glossy White)
reviews.text: Little did I know that you only need one four-way switch and two three-way switches to make a three switch circuit work properly. So I ended up with a lot of extra four-way switches. I wish that in the product description it would state something like that prominently. I guess it’s time for eBay lol.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.title: Little did I know

reviews.productTitle: ELEGRP 4 Way Decorative Light Switch, 15Amp, 120-277 Volt, AC Decorator Rocker Paddle Wall Switch Replacement, Self-Grounding, Residential and Commercial Grade, UL Listed (10 Pack, Glossy White)
reviews.text: Every other switch that I've installed connects wires using one of two ways: Either the wire slides into a hole "quick-connect", or you screw the wire to the side screw. This switch, however, you install by inserting the wire into a hole on the back, and then tightening the screw, which pulls a square nut that's inside of the housing to secure the wire. The problem is that 14AWG or larger doesn't fit into the holes with the large square nuts inside. (The nut obstructs the hole.) Also, you can't secure the wire to the outside because the screw is secured to the square washer inside alone rather than the housing itself, so it won't remain straight enough to hold the wire. I'm not sure why they designed them this way, perhaps the quick connect and side screws are patented or something. Buy these if you have small gauge wire, or enjoy being frustrated.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.title: Unusable (Poorly engineered)

reviews.productTitle: ELEGRP 4 Way Decorative Light Switch, 15Amp, 120-277 Volt, AC Decorator Rocker Paddle Wall Switch Replacement, Self-Grounding, Residential and Commercial Grade, UL Listed (10 Pack, Glossy White)
reviews.text: They're cheap, but solid. Of couse, can't beat Leviton and Lutron brands. Leviton and Lutron are expensive, therefore, it's a better option. For decorator wallplates, don't buy them from ELEGRP. Go with "ENERLITES Screwless Decorator'. Trust me, they will make your life easier, furthermore, ENERLITES have so many colors to choose from. BUT ENERLITES receptacle isn't that good. Therefore, buy receptacle from ELEGRP, but for wallplates, go for ENERLITES. ELEGRP wallplates are very difficult to open. Most of the times, you end up breaking them.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.title: Cheap but solid residential
